attributes.action: Launch full investigation into why there has been so many deaths and injuries in Primark stores.
attributes.additional_details:
Various Primark stores in the UK have been in the news for deaths and injuries, over the last few years.

Please investigate and ensure that above and beyond safety measures are put in place in every Primark store to prevent any falls or children getting trapped in escalators.

Woman dies after falling 80ft from third floor. (Liverpool / 23/10/2013) - http://goo.gl/KfB3LM

Boy gets had stuck in escalator. (Romford / 31/07/2013) - http://goo.gl/Ywkprc

Ryan Hooley from Beeston in Nottingham suffered 5 fractures to his skull after the accident at Nottingham's Primark store, doctors at Nottingham's Queen's Medical Centre, induced a coma.  (Nottingham / 26/10/2012) - http://goo.gl/tM6PIY

Three-year-old girl, left with serious injuries after falling 100ft from Escalator, "She suffered a broken left leg and left arm which have both been recast and she also received internal injuries.” - (Liverpool / 06/04/2008) - http://goo.gl/EG1JOZ
